transcript: I can't help it. I know her best. I was brought up next door to her, you know? These years when I think of someone from my wife, I think of Annie.

segments.text: I can't help it. I know her best. I was brought up next door to her, you know?
These years when I think of someone from my wife, I think of Annie.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I can't help it, I know her best.  I was brought up next door to her, you know?  These years when I think of someone for my wife, I think of Annie.
